name: PopTheBubble
description:
Controls are QWOP

Q will pop closest red bubbles on the screen

W will pop closest blue bubbles on the screen

O will pop closest green bubbles on the screen

P will pop closest yellow bubbles on the screen

If you press a button, and its corresponding colored bubble is not on the screen, you will lose 1 health. If a bubble touches the bottom of the screen, you will lose 1 health. You have a maximum of 3 health
